nodes.bodyText: @oowekyala I've not merged this (? extends T) into pmd/7.0.x, as this would have created too many follow up changes (e.g. in NodeStream). I think, this change is useful and we should tackle it in a separate change and doing this for the other methods here in Node as well (findChildrenOfType, getParentsOfType, ...). It will then also change the API: https://github.com/pmd/pmd/wiki/PMD-7.0.0-API#description-of-node-api (at least the doc, I assume this change is compatible).
